Package org.springframework.integration.dsl

Root package of the Spring Integration Java DSL.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IntegrationFlow
    The main Integration DSL abstraction.
    IntegrationFlows.ChannelsFunction
    The Channels-specific Function.
    IntegrationFlows.MessageProducersFunction
    The MessageProducers-specific Function.
    IntegrationFlows.MessageSourcesFunction
    The MessageSources-specific Function.
    IntegrationFlows.MessagingGatewaysFunction
    The MessagingGateways-specific Function.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRouterSpec<S extends AbstractRouterSpec<S,R>,R extends org.springframework.integration.router.AbstractMessageRouter>
    A MessageHandlerSpec for AbstractMessageRouters.
    Adapters  
    AggregatorSpec
    A CorrelationHandlerSpec for an AggregatingMessageHandler.
    BarrierSpec
    A MessageHandlerSpec for the BarrierMessageHandler.
    Channels  
    CorrelationHandlerSpec<S extends CorrelationHandlerSpec<S,H>,H extends org.springframework.integration.aggregator.AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler>
    A MessageHandlerSpec for an AbstractCorrelatingMessageHandler.
    DelayerEndpointSpec
    A ConsumerEndpointSpec for a DelayHandler.
    EnricherSpec
    The MessageHandlerSpec implementation for the ContentEnricher.
    FilterEndpointSpec
    A ConsumerEndpointSpec implementation for the MessageFilter.
    GatewayEndpointSpec
    A ConsumerEndpointSpec implementation for a mid-flow GatewayMessageHandler.
    GenericEndpointSpec<H extends org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandler>
    A ConsumerEndpointSpec for a MessageHandler implementations.
    HeaderEnricherSpec
    An IntegrationComponentSpec for a HeaderEnricher.
    IntegrationFlowAdapter
    The base Adapter class for the IntegrationFlow abstraction.
    IntegrationFlowBuilder  
    IntegrationFlowDefinition<B extends IntegrationFlowDefinition<B>>
    The Builder pattern implementation for the EIP-method chain.
    IntegrationFlows
    The central factory for fluent IntegrationFlowBuilder API.
    MessageProducers  
    MessageSources
    Provides various factory methods for MessageSourceSpecs from Namespace Factories.
    MessagingGateways  
    PublishSubscribeSpec  
    RecipientListRouterSpec
    An AbstractRouterSpec for a RecipientListRouter.
    ResequencerSpec  
    RouterSpec<K,R extends org.springframework.integration.router.AbstractMappingMessageRouter>
    The AbstractRouterSpec for an AbstractMappingMessageRouter.
    ScatterGatherSpec
    A GenericEndpointSpec extension for the ScatterGatherHandler.
    SourcePollingChannelAdapterSpec  
    SplitterEndpointSpec<S extends org.springframework.integration.splitter.AbstractMessageSplitter>
    A ConsumerEndpointSpec for a AbstractMessageSplitter implementations.
    StandardIntegrationFlow  

Package org.springframework.integration.dsl Description
